text:
I am I need of some guidance to accomplish this:   
Menu: 
     Item 1 
     Item 2
     Item 3

All 3 items go to the same page, but which one you click on from the navigation takes you to that location on the vertical scroll of the page.   So it would take you to midway thru if you clicked item 2.  I know it’s possible but not sure how to do it.    Thanks!

Anyone have a spare Inbound ticket (as a platinum partner, you get one free) they’d be willing to give me for my coworker if you’re not going? I got mine but HubSpot only gives one apparently to each company.
